title: Alice In Wonderland Watch Face
summary: Don't be late for a very important date! Stay on time with this wondrous watch
description: While in ambient mode, the watch displays the time with the mischievous grin of the cheshire cat. When you activate the watch, Wonderland pops into life as the caterpillar puffs on his hookah. The smoke will animate each time you look at the watch. This watch simply and artfully displays the time and your love of Alice in Wonderland.
descriptionHTML: While in ambient mode, the watch displays the time with the mischievous grin of the cheshire cat. When you activate the watch, Wonderland pops into life as the caterpillar puffs on his hookah. The smoke will animate each time you look at the watch. This watch simply and artfully displays the time and your love of Alice in Wonderland.
comments: Very nice work but pls add the date information below the time. Ty
Well worth 99 cents. I love that he blows a puff of smoke every time I unlock my watch. 10/10
Nice face but on the Moto 360 in ambient mode on the charger the Cheshire cat is facing sideways?
Such a cute watch!!! Simply and elegant :-)
recentChanges: v1.3: Adds support for Android Wear 2.0
Updated preview image when selecting the watch face.
